Player History
Injured on 4/3/1969 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1978...
Injured on 9/8/1978 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/22/1979 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/18/1982 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/26/1984, off Dave Righetti (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/24/1984, off Bob Shirley (PIT)...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1984...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1986...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 4/26/1990...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 7/7/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1991, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1991, hitting .417 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1991...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/14/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $6,250,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/14/1994 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
